definitions.text: the base part of a tree that remains standing after the tree has been felled
the part of a limb or tooth that remains after the rest is removed
(cricket) any of three upright wooden posts that form the wicket
a platform raised above the surrounding level to give prominence to the person on it
cause to be perplexed or confounded

examples: The men stomped through the snow in their heavy boots

definitions.text: travel through a district and make political speeches
